title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/pedro_samson.html
notes:
--------------
I, Samson Johnson, hereby renounce my fandom for the New York Yankees.  I realize now that George Steinbrenner is an evil man, and when he finally dies his body will crack in half and Spiders will come running out.

I, Samson Johnson, hereby renounce Babe Ruth and Joe Dimaggio.  I renounce Micky Mantle and Roger Maris.  I renounce Mariano Rivera and Don Mattingly.

I, Samson Johnson, hereby pledge my support in the National League for everyone's beloved New York Mets.  And in the American League, the loveable Boston Red Sox.

In the name of the great Sandy Koufax, I, Samson Johnson, speak truthfully.

Signed,
Samson Johnson

-------------

Thanks for doing this small task Samson, then I will help your family get their rightful money!

Pedro

messages.body:
SAMSON JOHNSON
REFUGEE CAMP,
SOUTH AFRICA,

FIRST AND FOREMOST,I MUST SOLICIT YOUR STRICTEST CONFIDENCE IN THIS
TRANSACTION AND I PRAY THAT MY DECISION TO CONTACT YOU WILL BE GIVEN
GENUINE APPROVAL CONSIDERING THE FACTS WE HAVE NOT KNOWN EACH OTHER
BEFORE, I WISH TO USE THIS OPPORTUNITY TO INTRODUCE MYSELF TO YOU.

I AM SAMSON JOHNSON FROM LIBERIA,WEST AFRICA. I WRITE TO INFORM YOU MY
DESIRE TO INVEST,AND TO BUY A LIVING HOUSE IN YOUR COUNTRY. I AM THE
FIRST SON OF MR. WEAH JOHNSON, HE WAS A DIAMOND/GOLD MERCHANT IN MY
COUNTRY.MY FATHER HAD A BULLET SHOT BY THE REBELS ON HIS WAY TRAVELLING
OUT OF MY COUNTRY WITH TWO OF MY YOUNGER SISTERS DUE TO CRISIS THAT WAS
OCCURING IN MY COUNTRY(LIBERIA).MY SISTERS DIED ON THE SPOT WHILE
U.N.PEACE KEEPING FORCE RESCUED MY FATHER,HE WAS TAKEN TO HOSPITAL FOR
MEDICAL TREATMENT WHICH HE LATER DIED.

BEFORE HE DIED HE REAVEALED TO ME AND MY MOTHER ABOUT $10 MILLION US
DOLLARS.WHICH HE DEPOSITED WITH A BANK IN EUROPE FOR SAFE KEEPING. MY
FATHER DID NOT DISCLOSE THIS TO ANY ONE,TO AVIOD THE LIBERIAN GOVERNMENT
FROM RAISING EYE BROWS TO THE FUNDS.

PRESENTLY MYSELF AND MY MOTHER ARE HERE IN SOUTH AFRICA AND WE ARE
STAYING IN THE REFUGEE CAMP. HOWEVER, WE HAVE NOTIFIED THE SECURITY
COMPANY ABOUT OUR INTENTION TO  CLAIM THE FUND WITH MY LATE FATHER'S
BUSINESS ASSOCIATE( AS IT WERE, IS YOU,  WHEN ACCEPTED). THEREFORE I
WANT YOU TO LECTURE ME ON HOW BEST WE CAN INVEST THIS MONEY,BECAUSE MY
FATHER TOLD ME THAT IT IS DANGEROUS TO INVEST THIS MONEY IN AFRICA TO
AVIOD SUSPICIONS,AND DUE TO MARKET INSTABILITY COUPLED WITH ECONOMIC AND
POLITICAL INSTABILITY FACING AFRICAN COUNTRIES,THAT IS WHY WE WANT TO
INVEST IN ABROAD.

FOR YOUR MUTUAL ASSISTANCE, MYSELF AND MY MOTHER HAVE AGREED TO OFFER
YOU 30% OF THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF THE MONEY.

WE HAVE ALL THE VITAL DOCUMENTS COVERING THE DEPOSIT AND THE OWNERSHIP
WHICH I CAN SEND TO YOU  ON REQUEST.

NOTE:I HAVE NEVER DISCLOSED THIS TO ANY PERSON APART FROM YOU,SO YOU
HAVE TO KEEP THIS TRANSACTION AS A TOP SECRET TO YOURSELF ALONE.
I WILL WANT YOU TO FORWARD ACROSS TO ME YOUR DIRECT TEL/FAX NUMBER FOR
MORE INFORMATION ABOUT THIS TRANSACTION.

BEST REGARDS,

SAMSON JOHNSON.
(FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY)

messages.body:
11/23/05

DEAR SAMSON JOHNSON:

I FEEL VERY BADLY FOR YOUR PLIGHT THAT YOUR FATHER HAD A BULLET THAT IS VERY SAD NEWS.  LIVING IN A REFUGEE  CAMP MUST BE WORSE THAN LIVING UNDER THE ELECTRIC EYE OF THE BOSTON MEDIA.

PLEASE LET ME KNOW HOW I CAN HELP.

I WOULD LIKE TO HELP YOU OBTAIN A LIVING HOUSE IN EXCHANGE FOR 30% EVEN SUPERAGENT SCOTT BORAS WOULD AGREE THIS IS A WIN WIN DEAL AND IF YOU THINK HE'S CRAZY YOU MIGHT BE RIGHT BECAUSE SEVEN YEARS AND EIGHTY FOUR MIL FOR DAMON IS A LITTLE AGRESSIVE IF YOU ASK ME.

THINGS ARE GOING GOOD HERE IN NEW YORK.  IT LOOKS LIKE WE JUST SWUNG CARLOS DELGADO AND WE ARE STILL PRESSING ON MANNY RAMIREZ AND BILLY WAGNER.  MAYBE THIS IS THE YEAR.

ANYWAY, TELL ME HOW I CAN HELP YOU AND YOUR POOR MOTHER.  I TRUST YOU ARE BOTH GOOD CHRISTIANS.

PEDRO MARTINEZ

messages.body:
11/28/05

Dear Pedro,
 
First and formost, i start by thanking you for your concern and willingness to assist the family to have and invest this fund. The transaction is 100% risk free.
 
The money belong to our late father and all the  necessary documents will be forwarded to you in a due course as soon as you send the below information which will enable us facilitate the onward transfer of the fund into the bank account of your wish.Rigth now, what i want are.
 
1, YOUR TELEPHONE AND FAX NUMBER,
2, YOUR CONTACT ADDRESS AND
3, YOUR INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT OR DRIVER'S LICENCE.
 
Note that with your solid cooperation, the bank where this fund is, will be given to you with the needed documents.
 
I strongly assure you,it is hitch free as everything will be put in place for smooth transaction.

Thanks.
Samson J.

Pedro

Dear Pedro,
I'm delighted to read your possitve response.You should not be worried as every arrangement is made to see that we go through without hitch.
Concerning the garantee,i don't know what exactly you want but i assure you, you will never regret doing this business with my family. We are christains, please our mails and words therein is my bond.Do not intertain any fear as time will prove to you the kind of family you are dealing with.
On the other hand, I have forwarded your name to the bank (where the money is), as soon as the necessary documents concerning the release of the fund in your name are processed, you will be informed on the next line of action.
Moreso, please let sincerity be our watchword, as soon as the fund get to your account.
My regards,
Samson J.

messages.body:
Fri, Dec 2, 2005 at 12:36 PM

Dear Samson:

Thanks for your response.  Your words reassure me, however, I would still need certain guarantees if this is to go through.  I look forward to the communication with the bank.  Tell me, do you have a favorite baseball team?  Is there much baseball where you live?

1. I need a guarantee from you that my image or likeness would not be used without express written consent from either myself or the MLB Players Association.
2. I need the deal to be at least four years bacause my rotator cuff could let go at any time.

I'm looking forward to a big year here - it's like Omar Minaya is a drunken sailor on shore leave.  He's paying anyone he can find - it's like "We Are The World"; quite a collection of all stars.

Best regards,
Pedro

Dear Pedro,
How are you today?
I have wasted much time to get back to you, thats as a result of circumstances beyond my control, however, do bear with me.The reason i have not send the guaranteed is because, the refugee camp authority did not allow us out of the camp, which should have enable me get a service of a lawyer to prepare the guaranteed bond.all the same, below is the one i manage to prepare.if that is what you want, let me know as we can not afford to waste much time.
 
I MR. SAMSON JOHNSON on behalf of the entire family of late MR WEAH JOHNSON guarantee MR PEDRO MARTINEZ that the fund ($10 MILLION US DOLLARS) is legally deposited by MR W. JOHNSON ( my father). The family has authorized MR PEDRO MARTINEZ  to cliam and invest the fund on our behalf for the period of less than four years. And also the family has promise to give to him 30% of the total sum for the service rendered when the fund get into his account.
On one hand, I MR PEDRO MARTINEZ assure the entire family of late MR. W. JOHNSON that i will not seat on the money when it gets into my account, i wll do exaltly as stated above.
Mr Samson Johnson                                                                                        Mr Pedro Martinez
(for the family) 07/12/2005                                                                            sign
 
NOTE: There is no scanner available here in the camp, please sign and i promise to do that as well very soon.
The bank is almost done with the processing, Please let me know when you are  contacted.The Bank name is DOMAIN TRUST BANK.
My regards,
Samson J.

-Pedro

messages.subject: GOD HAS DONE IT FOR US, PRAISE HIM FOR HE IS A GOOD LORD.
messages.body:
Mar 4, 2006 9:44 AM 

Dear Pedro,
I know you may not want to read from me again as a result of my asking you for financial help which i knew we needed so much to enable us get our fund that is out there in Spain. I sensed you were skiptical about it, may be it is too good to be real.
But to God be the glory. A good friend of my father has discovered our location and promise to help us in making sure we get that fund in Spain. And not only that, as it were,he also promised that i will start from where my Dad stop by registering me to my father's business association. Remember, i told you that my late Dad  deals on precious stones (GOLD AND DIAMOND).
What i want you to do is to be my partiner so  that my customers in Europe and America can be paying to your account as i'm not in USA. Open a fresh account without or a little amont.As the account owner, you are in title to 10% (percent) of any payment made to the account.The banks you need to open a new account are any of the following.......... 
Wells Fargo Bank  United States
Bank of America.(Equity Credit Online Account)
Royal Bank of Canada and
HSBC  USA
These are the banks my customers can pay easily without hitch. 
My late Dad's customers has been given to me back by the association, help me to thank God from the heart of your heart for His grace.
This is not a child's play, you should be honest in all your dealings as i will instroduce you to many precious stone dealers that you will benefit from. I'm doing this to prove my autenticity and genuiness. I have known you and i don't think it will be wise to use other persons' account for the selling payment. I urge you to be honest and be committed.
This is just the begining, when you see me one on one you will be appreciative, in the next few months.
Thanks,
Samson J.
